mapper.insert: insert into t_emp (eid, emp_name, age, sex, email, did) values (#{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_emp set emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select eid, emp_name, age, sex, email, did from t_emp
